subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|糸|t1=thread|各|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – wrapped in thread, a web of thread.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=luò,lào,1nb=vernacular,2nb=literary
|m_note=lào - only used in {{zh-l|*絡子}}

|h=gd=log6
|mn=lo̍k/lo̍h/tw:le
|mn_note=lo̍k - literary; lo̍h - vernacular; le - 勒 is used in the Mainland
|mn-t=log8
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=
|cat=v,n
}}
